name: ts-morph-structures
description: Structure classes for ts-morph, including type structure classes.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && gulp
scripts.debug: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && node --inspect-brk ../../node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js
scripts.tasks: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && gulp --tasks
scripts.build-stage-one: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && gulp stage_one
scripts.build-stage-two: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && gulp stage_two
scripts.build-stage-three: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && gulp stage_three
scripts.use-cases: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && gulp use_cases
scripts.debug-stage-one: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && node --inspect-brk ../../node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js stage_one
scripts.debug-stage-two: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && node --inspect-brk ../../node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js stage_two
scripts.debug-stage-three: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && node --inspect-brk ../../node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js stage_three
scripts.debug-use-cases: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && node --inspect-brk ../../node_modules/gulp/bin/gulp.js use_cases
scripts.is-repo-clean: npm run clean && npm run tsc-buildsystem && node ./gulp-utilities/assertRepoIsClean.js

author: Alexander J. Vincent <ajvincent@gmail.com>
